html: We know that a foreign government actively sought to influence an American election - and that not enough has been done to keep that from happening again. We know that there were multiple incidents that are deeply troubling.

html: But she's thankful to be alive. Thanks to the Medicaid expansion and funding, she can see specialists to navigate cancer and paralyzed vocal chords.
text: But she's thankful to be alive. Thanks to the Medicaid expansion and funding, she can see specialists to navigate cancer and paralyzed vocal chords.

html: Sitting with her wife, her niece, and great nephew, Taylor shared the story of cancer and countless surgeries. She told me of her dream job as a JAG officer in the U.S. Marine Corps and how her health and hours-long doctors appointments have dashed those dreams.
text: Sitting with her wife, her niece, and great nephew, Taylor shared the story of cancer and countless surgeries. She told me of her dream job as a JAG officer in the U.S. Marine Corps and how her health and hours-long doctors appointments have dashed those dreams.

html: Visited Dexter Avenue King Memorial Baptist Church, where Dr. King was pastor and organized the Montgomery bus boycotts.
text: Visited Dexter Avenue King Memorial Baptist Church, where Dr. King was pastor and organized the Montgomery bus boycotts.

html: We visited Brown Chapel A.M.E. Church in Selma and heard songs and stories from Bettie Mae Fikes and Chuck Neblett. They spoke about the important role that music played in fueling the civil rights movement. #FPICivilRightspic.twitter.com/RKhRRcuUWn
text: We visited Brown Chapel A.M.E. Church in Selma and heard songs and stories from Bettie Mae Fikes and Chuck Neblett. They spoke about the important role that music played in fueling the civil rights movement. #FPICivilRightspic.twitter.com/RKhRRcuUWn

html: Today we followed in the footsteps of history. A true honor to again join @repjohnlewis and reflect on the sacrifice of the civil rights pilgrims on Bloody Sunday with our bipartisan delegation of over 40 Members of Congress. #FPICivilRightspic.twitter.com/c3NQ1FSY6A – at edmond pettus bridge

html: On March 7, 1965, John Lewis led a 600 person protest march from Selma to Montgomery to elevate the issue of voting rights. They were stopped at the Edmund Pettus Bridge - sprayed with teargas and beaten with clubs.
text: On March 7, 1965, John Lewis led a 600 person protest march from Selma to Montgomery to elevate the issue of voting rights. They were stopped at the Edmund Pettus Bridge - sprayed with teargas and beaten with clubs.

html: It was wrong that the 2017 #TaxScam opened up the Arctic for oil and gas drilling. It violates the rights of the Gwich'in people, worsens climate change, and threatens local ecosystems. That's why I'm a cosponsor of the Arctic Cultural and Coastal Plain Protection Act!
text: It was wrong that the 2017 #TaxScam opened up the Arctic for oil and gas drilling. It violates the rights of the Gwich'in people, worsens climate change, and threatens local ecosystems. That's why I'm a cosponsor of the Arctic Cultural and Coastal Plain Protection Act!

html: Americans deserve a government that works, and I'm excited the new Select Committee on the Modernization of Congress has announced its new members. Welcome aboard! I'm pumped to start working towards bipartisan change to get Congress working for the people again.

html: It’s important to restore public faith in our democracy. Protecting voting rights, strengthening ethics rules to ensure that public officials serve the public interest, and reducing the role of big money in politics are vital first steps. #HR1 does all these things.
text: It’s important to restore public faith in our democracy. Protecting voting rights, strengthening ethics rules to ensure that public officials serve the public interest, and reducing the role of big money in politics are vital first steps. #HR1 does all these things.

html: Americans deserve to know who is paying for the political ads they see online, and we deserve to know that the nation’s election watchdog is walking the beat and protecting our democracy.
text: Americans deserve to know who is paying for the political ads they see online, and we deserve to know that the nation’s election watchdog is walking the beat and protecting our democracy.

html: I’m excited that the first bill the House has taken up this year, #HR1, includes two bipartisan proposals for which I’ve advocated- the #HonestAds Act and a bill that reforms the Federal Election Commission, the nation's election watchdog.
text: I’m excited that the first bill the House has taken up this year, #HR1, includes two bipartisan proposals for which I’ve advocated- the #HonestAds Act and a bill that reforms the Federal Election Commission, the nation's election watchdog.

html: This committee represents an important step forward in renovating the House. Americans deserve a Congress where they have a say and things get done. They deserve a Congress that uses cutting-edge technology and that is as diverse as our nation. 2/3
text: This committee represents an important step forward in renovating the House.  Americans deserve a Congress where they have a say and things get done.  They deserve a Congress that uses cutting-edge technology and that is as diverse as our nation. 2/3

html: It has been clear for a long time that the House is a fixer-upper. Every time bills are written behind closed doors or passed without debate, every time Americans feel like they don’t have a say and too little is getting done, people lose faith. Congress needs to do better. 1/3
text: It has been clear for a long time that the House is a fixer-upper. Every time bills are written behind closed doors or passed without debate, every time Americans feel like they don’t have a say and too little is getting done, people lose faith. Congress needs to do better. 1/3

html: Ever since my first job at West Side Video in Port Angeles, I’ve never had a job where I expected my boss to approve a leave request if my work wasn’t finished. Congress ought to function the same way. That's why, w/ @reparrington, I'm introducing a "No Budget, No Recess" plan.
text: Ever since my first job at West Side Video in Port Angeles, I’ve never had a job where I expected my boss to approve a leave request if my work wasn’t finished. Congress ought to function the same way. That's why, w/ @reparrington, I'm introducing a "No Budget, No Recess" plan.

html: It’s time for comprehensive reform to Congress’s budgeting process that incentivizes progress over partisanship. That’s the driving force behind the "No-budget, No-recess" amendment @RepArrington and I will offer next week. https://bit.ly/2FA0fQu

html: I am reminded of the words of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. who said: “Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.” #PittsburghStrong
text:
I am reminded of the words of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. who said:
“Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.” #PittsburghStrong

html: I am saddened and angered by today’s shooting in #Pittsburgh. Hatred has no place in our society. Neither does violence. We’ve seen too many moments of silence and too few moments of action to prevent tragedies like today’s. (1/2)
text: I am saddened and angered by today’s shooting in #Pittsburgh. Hatred has no place in our society. Neither does violence.  We’ve seen too many moments of silence and too few moments of action to prevent tragedies like today’s. (1/2)

html: Tonight as part of the national Commemoration of the 50th Anniversary of the Vietnam War we gathered as friends and neighbors in Port Angeles and said something 50 years overdue—thank you. Thank you to the 93 veterans honored tonight and to all who served.pic.twitter.com/rMECFuLv8r

html: Today I spoke before @GovInslee 's orca task force. Thousands of jobs in our region, our state's economic health, and our identity depend on a cleaner Puget Sound, more salmon and more orca. There's no silver bullet here--more like silver buckshot. Count me as a partner.pic.twitter.com/dGNR2GUkjw
text: Today I spoke before @GovInslee 's orca task force. Thousands of jobs in our region, our state's economic health, and our identity depend on a cleaner Puget Sound, more salmon and more orca. html: A recent @WSU study ID'ed tire particles that stromwater carried from our roads to our streams as the prime suspect in the deaths of coho salmon. Check out this map from @Conserve_WA that maps how stormwater flows into our waters, affecting salmon & #orca https://stormwaterheatmap.org/#/mapgee

html: Stormwater runoff is the leading source of pollution in Puget Sound. The P3 Act, which @RepDennyHeck and I introduced last week, would make it easier to build green #infrastructure that mimics nature and slows, filters and captures it. Here's more:http://www.washingtonnature.org/cities/stormwater/green-infrastructure-infographic/ …
text: Stormwater runoff is the leading source of pollution in Puget Sound. The P3 Act, which @RepDennyHeck and I introduced last week, would make it easier to build green #infrastructure that mimics nature and slows, filters and captures it. Here's more:http://www.washingtonnature.org/cities/stormwater/green-infrastructure-infographic/ …

html: WE'RE LIVE: As the #orca task force meets in Tacoma, I'm touring some green infrastructure projects that capture stormwater, the leading source of pollution in Puget Sound, & talking w/ experts about how the P3 Act can create green infrastructure projects. https://www.facebook.com/derek.kilmer/videos/484057068766731/ …

html: America's partnership with Israel extends to space where together we study climate change, create new tech, & inspire kids to learn the STEM subjects. I’m pleased the House recently passed my bipartisan plan to formalize the space partnership between our nations.
text: America's partnership with Israel extends to space where together we study climate change, create new tech, & inspire kids to learn the STEM subjects. I’m pleased the House recently passed my bipartisan plan to formalize the space partnership between our nations.

html: These funds will help the tribe build a new school on higher ground to make sure their kids are safe when disaster strikes. I'll keep pushing for investments that make tribal and coastal communities more resilient in the face of rising seas, and under the threat of tsunamis.

html: This past Friday marked a unique anniversary for my family. It was 70 years ago that my family boarded a ship called the Queen Elizabeth 1 in Europe and came to America. I feel lucky for the amazing opportunity that this country has provided.
text: This past Friday marked a unique anniversary for my family.  It was 70 years ago that my family boarded a ship called the Queen Elizabeth 1 in Europe and came to America.  I feel lucky for the amazing opportunity that this country has provided.

html: The @USCCRgov released a report on voting rights today. It shows we have a long way to go before all citizens can exercise their rights. Government’s job is to make it easier to #VOTE not harder. That’s why Im working w/ @RepVeasey and @RonWyden to make Sept. Voting Rights Month.

html: Tomorrow I’m speaking with Washington’s own, @AstroAnnimal before she heads to space with @NASA Expeditions 58/59 in December. I’m collecting questions today from WA-06 using the hashtag #DerekAskNASA, & I’ll be streaming the call tomorrow on Facebook at 1:30pm PST.
text:
Tomorrow I’m speaking with Washington’s own, @AstroAnnimal before she heads to space with @NASA Expeditions 58/59 in December. 

I’m collecting questions today from WA-06 using the hashtag #DerekAskNASA, & I’ll be streaming the call tomorrow on Facebook at 1:30pm PST.

html: Like many of you, I have loved ones in my family who have #preexistingconditions, so this is personal. I'm open to fixing the parts of the Affordable Care Act that aren't working, but no one with pre-existing conditions should be denied health insurance.
text: Like many of you, I have loved ones in my family who have #preexistingconditions, so this is personal. I'm open to fixing the parts of the Affordable Care Act that aren't working, but no one with pre-existing conditions should be denied health insurance.

html: Yesterday I signed on to a resolution that would let the House defend Americans with #preexistingconditions.
text: Yesterday I signed on to a resolution that would let the House defend Americans with #preexistingconditions.

html: Soon, a court in Texas will decide whether or not Americans with #preexistingconditions can be denied health insurance. The Trump Administration wants that court to turn the clock back to a time when people could be denied coverage. I disagree.
text: Soon, a court in Texas will decide whether or not Americans with #preexistingconditions can be denied health insurance. The Trump Administration wants that court to turn the clock back to a time when people could be denied coverage. I disagree.

html: After someone made a bomb threat against the Stroum Jewish Community Center, I co-wrote a bill that would make threats against religious community centers federal hate crimes. The Senate passed it last night! Next stop is a final House vote. Here's more:https://www.seattletimes.com/opinion/a-threat-to-a-religious-center-should-be-a-hate-crime/ …

html: Gutting the Clean Power Plan is not just bad for the #environment, it's bad for our economy. It will cost us up to 560k US #jobs by 2030. Rather than doubling down on the dated, dirty ways of the past, let's lock in long-term jobs by investing in our clean-energy future. #CPP
text: Gutting the Clean Power Plan is not just bad for the #environment, it's bad for our economy. It will cost us up to 560k US #jobs by 2030. Rather than doubling down on the dated, dirty ways of the past, let's lock in long-term jobs by investing in our clean-energy future. #CPP

Let’s #fixourparks together!

html: The National Parks System is America’s crown jewel. But, there’s a $16bn and growing maintenance backlog. I just joined a bipartisan group of colleagues to introduce the Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act to #fixourparks pic.twitter.com/rtLkMUAg6X
text: The National Parks System is America’s crown jewel. But, there’s a $16bn and growing maintenance backlog. I just joined a bipartisan group of colleagues to introduce the Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act to #fixourparks pic.twitter.com/rtLkMUAg6X

html: About 40% of Americans in rural communities don’t have #broadband. That makes it harder to start a business or do homework. Today I met with folks in Grays Harbor working on this issue to talk with them about a bill I’m introducing to bring broadband to more places. Stay tuned!pic.twitter.com/V18CWl3UsQ

html: A healthy Puget Sound is important for so many reasons — including the ability to go catch (and eat) some crabs! html: The #LWCF has built parks in places like Tacoma and protected forestland and shellfish beds in Kitsap and Mason Counties. The LWCF's 600 projects in our region support WA's $1.6bn outdoor economy, and thousands of jobs. Congress must prevent it from expiring in 100 days.

html: Offshore drilling risks everything. Today, I proposed a bipartisan amendment to block drilling off our coast. While the amendment failed, there are more chances down the road. I'll keep fighting for our coasts. #ProtectOurCoastpic.twitter.com/ptB9HVRn49
text:
Offshore drilling risks everything. 

Today, I proposed a bipartisan amendment to block drilling off our coast. While the amendment failed, there are more chances down the road. I'll keep fighting for our coasts. #ProtectOurCoastpic.twitter.com/ptB9HVRn49

html: Budget dysfunction hurts folks in our neck of the woods more than almost anywhere else. Today I was named to the bipartisan committee of Senators and Representatives tasked with fixing the problem. I'm excited for the chance to end the uncertainty and bring your voice back to DC.

html: Today 13 Russian nationals and three Russian entities were indicted for buying online political ads in an attempt to influence how you vote. Congress should shine a light on the political ads Americans see online by passing the #HonestAds Act.
